actions.name: default
actions.description: Compresses an image without altering the dimensions.

actions.name: hero
actions.description: Resizes an image for placement in a hero.

actions.name: icon
actions.description: Resizes an image for use as an icon.

actions.name: avatar
actions.description: Resizes an image for use as an avatar.

actions.name: thumbnail
actions.description: Resizes an image for use as a thumbnail.
